name: Crisis Intervention and Critical Incident Debriefing
description: Crisis intervention an immediate and short-term psychological intervention aimed at assisting individuals to help restore balance in their life and minimize long term trauma.
fullDescription: Crisis intervention an immediate and short-term psychological intervention aimed at assisting individuals to help restore balance in their life and minimize long term trauma.
whatTheyOffer: Crisis intervention is an immediate and short-term psychological intervention aimed at assisting individuals in a crisis situation in order to restore balance in their life and minimize long term trauma.
howToGetIt: Drop in or call in 24 hrs for intake interview - - During business hours: you can speak with a CASARC intake nurse. - After business hours: a CASARC nurse will return your call as soon as possible. Phone: (628) 206-8386
keywords: consult a crisis counselor to come to zsfg ed
agency: Child and Adolescent Support, Advocacy & Resource Center (CASARC) SFGH
